body: Barring all of the things people have already said about this hentai here, the cylindrical thighs at page 18 are very aesthetically pleasing.
My favorite Femdom artist is Hanabi.
@smollydee What numbers have good Gentle Femdom Doujins? Most of the Femdoms I read are abusive and lack regards to consent.
Most of the Femdom I read don't turn into Maledom. As for Korean Femdom's there is also No Holes Barred, and S Flower.

@smollydee Thanks for the measured response! You see, femdom+bondage also includes lesbian femdom. Futa and pegging are not even pure femdom (although the sheer mass of the content might lead you to believe otherwise). I know Dhibi, of course, but his works usually don't include sex, merely anal. I post on Reddit as u/LHP_Mystery, you might check at least a selection of JAVs on the topic. Sadistic Beauty is an insanely good Korean femdom manhwa, but that's it. 272241 and 198226 are cute. 40denier is decent. Piririnegi and Yamaha Rian's works are hot, although too extreme. || Look at these - 168799, 264367, 314803, [a nurse femdom manga which I can't find for the love of me]  - classic examples of femdom turning to maledom, where the guy is never tied up at the end.

@Ianuda
Clearly I've misinterpreted your idea of femdom. In which case I concede, since its true that most femdom doujins are pretty extreme like you said(urethra insertion, lack of consent, cbt ,etc..). And with your insistence on bondage, narrows down the choice of content even further. 

But I would have to disagree with femdom bondage being rare. The problem is that you searched specifically for "femdom+bondage+sole male", you have to understand that alot(and I mean ALOT) of doujins on this site still have missing tags.

For example, 283671,318662 (its in chinese tho),189784(futa warning)  are either missing "sole male" and/or "bondage" tags.

Searching "bondage+femdom" returns about 5K results, which is like ~14% of the bondage tag and thats not including the ones that are not tagged. So no, "bondage+femdom+sole male" isn't all that rare. And if you are willing to sift through all 35k of the whole bondage tag, I'm sure you would find more.

@smollydee Case in point. Otochichi - 319794 - urethra insertion, pegging, zero bondage. WTF even is this? Random extreme stuff that people call "femdom", which doesn't even have sex (PiV) to begin with? Congrats. Even JAVs are better, and there are months without a single femdom video released (let alone femdom bondage).

@smollydee No, femdom bondage 100% is as rare as a homophobic atheist in America. Just search femdom+bondage+sole male - it has so little content, it barely exists. No, quite a lot are pure pegging, quite a lot have zero bondage, and the rest (where the male is bound), it all ends with the male being put into a dominant, missionary position.

@Ianuda
"without the story devolving into boring maledom"

WTF are you on about? Click on the Femdom tag and 99.9% of them are pretty much female power fantasy. Doskoinpo, Otochichi, Dhibi, Aimaitei Umami works among many others all depict femdom with the females maintaining dominance, some are even set in a female dominated world ffs.  If anything maledom as a genre is the rare one here.

Save for the one FatalPulse work where a bunch of Admirals turned the tide of femdom shipgirls gone rogue, I can't think of any works on top of my head which as you described it as "devolving into boring maledom" happening.  Plus, most maledom doujins I've seen this far are in bad taste or just plain rape and/or torture.

 I have yet seen a good maledom doujin where the male dom actually acts like a human being which actually cares about the wellbeing their sub, but yet there are many gentle femdom doujins out there where the female dom provide some really sweet aftercare for their sub.
Are we finally in the Blessed time where calipur work is going to be translated

P.S. Fuck off anyone who considers it cucked! Are you retarded or what? I am a living proof that I can be into pure sh*ria law poltically, but have a gentle femdom _sexual_ fantasy! Can you tell them apart? Politics <<< >>> Sexual fetishes. Thank you. Blame the political simps.
